title: Matchsafe, "Gibson Girl and Flowers", ca. 1895
markings: STERLING stamped on front and reverse of bezel.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Oblong, curved sides, rounded corners, featuring raised decoration of Gibson Girl with upswept hair and low cut dress, leaning forward to smell roses in small vase on table top, identical decoration on reverse. Lid hinged on side. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Gibson Girl and Flowers", ca. 1895.
ca. 1895. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-1251.
